item.title: 阿拉比卡因供应担忧创 2014 年以来最大月度涨幅
item.description: 阿拉比卡期货有望创下十多年来的最大单月涨幅，全球供应担忧引发的涨势将价格推向接近历史最高点。【原文：Arabica futures are on track for the biggest monthly jump in more than a decade, with a rally fulled by global supply concerns sending prices to near-record highs.】

item.title: 为什么女性不太可能使用人工智能？
item.description:
人工智能的早期采用者中男性比例过高，这种脱节可能会加剧男女薪酬差距

。【原文：

AI’s early adopters are disproportionately men, a disconnect that could stands to exacerbate the gender pay gap

】

item.title: 巴西失业率降至历史新低，卢拉赢得最新胜利
item.description: 巴西的失业率降至有记录以来的最低水平，这代表着总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦在政治上的胜利，同时也加重了决策者对经济运行过热的担忧。【原文：Brazil’s jobless rate fell to the lowest level on record, representing a political win for a President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva while adding to the concern of policymakers who fear the economy is running too hot.】

item.title: 亚马逊商家成功转用低成本的 Temu
item.description: 一位商家入驻特姆优的举动表明，中国购物网站可能会给亚马逊带来真正的挑战。但首先...【原文：One merchant’s move to Temu suggests the Chinese shopping site may offer a real challenge to Amazon. But first...】

item.title: 在严酷的沙漠中种植黄瓜凸显沙特推动粮食安全的决心
item.description: 在沙特阿拉伯地形最恶劣的地区之一，一个农场正在曾经无法使用的土地上种植黄瓜和西红柿等农产品。【原文：A farm in one of Saudi Arabia’s harshest terrains is growing produce from cucumbers to tomatoes on land that was once unusable.】

item.title: 沙特财富基金重心转移影响部分项目预算
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯的主权财富基金正准备在第二年削减一些地方项目的预算，即使它增加了总体支出，这反映了沙特王国在一项万亿美元的经济改革计划中优先事项的变化。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund is preparing to cut budgets for some local projects for a second year even as it increases overall spending, reflecting the kingdom’s shifting priorities in a trillion-dollar plan to overhaul the economy.】

item.title: 欧元区通胀数据对辩论双方都有帮助
item.description: 我是克雷格-斯特林（Craig Stirling），法兰克福资深编辑。今天我们将关注欧元区通胀的最新数据，以及这对利率的影响。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Craig Stirling, a senior editor in Frankfurt. item.title: 联合信贷银行聘请德勤为 Banco BPM 收购案提供咨询服务
item.description: 知情人士透露，意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）已聘请德勤会计师事务所（Deloitte LLP）为这家意大利第二大银行收购 Banco BPM SpA 提供咨询。【原文：UniCredit SpA has hired Deloitte LLP to advise Italy’s second-biggest bank on its takeover bid for Banco BPM SpA, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 英国央行认为债券价格修正风险与绿色转型有关
item.description: 英格兰银行表示，由于未能正确考虑气候转型带来的风险，债券市场可能面临突如其来的价格冲击。【原文：Bond markets may be facing sudden price shocks due to a failure to correctly take into account the risks associated with the climate transition, according to the Bank of England.】

item.title: 航运巨头将 60 亿美元财富转向股票市场
item.description: 据知情人士透露，希腊最富有的航运巨头玛丽亚-安杰利库西（Maria Angelicoussis）的家族办公室在私人市场的押注获得巨大收益后，正在推动公开交易投资。【原文：The family office for Maria Angelicoussis, Greece’s richest shipping magnate, is boosting publicly traded investments after notching up huge gains in private market bets, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 2024 年结束时华尔街的得与失
item.description: 对于那些投资股票的人来说，2024 年的情况出乎意料地好，S&P 500 指数的年度涨幅有望成为历史上最好的年度涨幅之一。早在 1 月份，当交易员和策略师们因担心美国经济会硬着陆而准备应对动荡时，很少有人想到这一点。【原文：How thankful Wall Streeters are this week likely depends on what asset they are paid to trade.For those investing in equities, 2024 has proven unexpectedly good with the S&P 500’s annual gain on course to be one of the best in history.Few expected that back in January when traders and strategists were bracing for turbulence amid worries the US economy was barreling toward a hard landing.Instead, the market has been lifted by a resilient economy, rising earnings and a handful of tech titans.】

item.title: 欧洲电视网与鲨鱼坦克在欧洲顶级初创企业大会上相遇
item.description:
在Slush，桑拿浴室里热气腾腾，资金流汹涌澎湃，演示、DJ和对国防科技的重视与日俱增。【原文：

The saunas were hot and the money was flowing at Slush, which featured demos, DJs and a growing emphasis on defense technology.

】

item.title: 世贸组织成员批准奥孔乔-伊韦拉连任掌舵人
item.description: 世界贸易组织成员同意再次任命恩戈齐-奥孔乔-伊韦拉（Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala）连任总干事一职，使她在预计将充满关税争端的下一个四年里继续担任这一职务。【原文：World Trade Organization members agreed to reappoint Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala as director-general for a second term, cementing her in the job for another four years expected to be fraught with tariff disputes.】

item.title: 普拉博沃表示，印尼将在 2025 年把最低工资提高 6.5%
item.description: 印度尼西亚总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）宣布，由于东南亚最大经济体的消费疲软，明年工人的最低工资将提高 6.5%。【原文：Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto announced a 6.5% increase in workers’ minimum wage next year as consumption falters in Southeast Asia’s largest economy.】

item.title: 印度经济增长降至近两年新低
item.description: 印度的经济增长速度为近两年来最慢，影响了全年的经济前景，并给央行带来了降息压力。【原文：India’s economy grew at its slowest pace in almost two years, dampening the outlook for the full year and putting pressure on the central bank to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 英国央行警告：非银行对危机时刻准备不足
item.description: 英格兰银行周五表示，非银行机构往往无法预测其交易对手、投资者和市场在压力下的行为，并警告说，这个庞大的行业在危机时期有可能 "准备不足"。【原文：Non-banks are often not able to predict how their counterparties, investors and markets will behave in times of stress, the Bank of England said on Friday, warning the sprawling sector risked being “underprepared” in times of crisis.】

item.title: 英国央行称私募基金与保险公司的合作会带来风险
item.description: 英格兰银行警告说，私募股权基金进军保险业加剧了 "火灾销售 "的风险，从而扰乱了金融市场的运作。【原文：Private equity’s advance into the insurance sector exacerbates the risk of “fire sales” that disrupt the functioning of financial markets, the Bank of England warned.】

item.title: 欧洲央行修改欧元系统抵押品框架
item.description: 欧洲中央银行宣布修改欧元系统抵押品框架，以加强协调统一。【原文：The European Central Bank announced changes to the Eurosystem collateral framework to foster greater harmonization.】

item.title: 欧元区通胀加速，但不会阻碍欧洲央行降息
item.description: 欧元区通胀率攀升至高于欧洲央行 2% 的目标，但欧洲央行官员下月及以后继续降息的可能性不大。【原文：Euro-area inflation climbed above the European Central Bank’s 2% target, though officials are unlikely to be deterred from continuing to lower interest rates next month and beyond.】

item.title: 明星银行家离职 10 个月后，华兴资本首席执行官辞职
item.description: 华兴资本控股有限公司首席执行官谢逸敬已经辞职，他从联合创始人包凡手中接过这个职位还不到 10 个月，而包凡这位明星银行家自去年年初以来就从公众视线中消失了。【原文：China Renaissance Holdings Ltd.’s Chief Executive Officer Xie Yi Jing has resigned, less than 10 months after assuming the duties from co-founder Bao Fan, a star banker who has vanished from the public eye since early last year.】

item.title: 明尼苏第三季度收入增长强劲，原因是价格亲民
item.description: 美尼索集团控股有限公司（Miniso Group Holding Ltd.）公布第三季度收入实现两位数增长，在经济环境不确定的情况下，消费者对平价商品的需求使这家中国家居装饰、化妆品和个人护理产品零售商受益匪浅。【原文：Miniso Group Holding Ltd. reported double-digit revenue growth in the third quarter, as the Chinese retailer of home decor, cosmetics and personal care products benefited from consumer demand for affordable goods amid an uncertain economic environment.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行计划与法国农业信贷银行会面，讨论 BPM 银行竞购事宜
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）计划在未来几周内与法国农业信贷银行（Credit Agricole SA）举行一次会议，讨论该意大利银行对国内竞争对手的收购要约，而法国农业信贷银行是该竞争对手的最大股东。【原文：UniCredit SpA is planning to hold a meeting with Credit Agricole SA in the next few weeks to discuss the Italian bank’s takeover bid for a domestic rival in which the French lender is the biggest shareholder.】

item.title: 英国房贷审批在预算案公布前创下逾两年新高
item.description: 由于购房者摆脱了对税收上调和利率持续走高的焦虑，上个月英国抵押贷款数量创下了两年多来的新高。【原文：The number of UK mortgages given the green light hit a more than two-year high last month as buyers shrugged off anxiety over tax hikes and persistently elevated interest rates.】

item.title: 外卖英雄首席执行官称塔拉巴特首次公开募股使母公司价值 "被低估
item.description: 对于 Delivery Hero SE 来说，中东业务部门的上市带来了一笔急需的意外之财，同时也带来了一个棘手的问题。【原文：For Delivery Hero SE, the public listing of its Middle Eastern unit brings a much needed cash windfall — and a vexing problem.】

item.title: 经济增长前景恶化，欧元创下一年多来最差月度纪录
item.description: 由于美国贸易关税将打击该地区本已遭受重创的经济，欧元有望创下一年多来最糟糕的一个月。【原文：The euro is on track to cap its worst month in over a year, blighted by the prospect that US trade tariffs will hit the region’s already battered economy.】

item.title: 债券供应激增，中国人民银行注入 1,110 亿美元流动性
item.description: 在地方政府债券销售激增的情况下，中国本月通过最近推出的政策工具加大了向银行系统注入现金的力度，以确保充足的流动性。【原文：China boosted its cash injection into the banking system via a recently launched policy tool this month, in a move to ensure sufficient liquidity amid a surge in local government bond sales.】

item.title: 滴滴再次实现盈利，同时为香港上市做准备
item.description: 滴滴出行（Didi Global Inc.【原文：Didi Global Inc. posted its second straight quarterly profit, a boost for the Chinese ride-hailing leader as it contemplates a potential re-listing in Hong Kong.】

item.title: 加密货币 1 万亿美元的反弹尚未重现大流行病时代的狂热
item.description: 有争议的加密货币大亨孙正义（Justin Sun）在香港吃了一根价值 620 万美元的香蕉，满脸笑容，这一奇观让人们更加关注数字资产，因为该行业正试图保持市场的历史性反弹。【原文：Controversial crypto mogul Justin Sun beamed as he ate a $6.2 million banana in Hong Kong, a spectacle that ratcheted up the spotlight on digital assets as the industry tries to keep an historic market rally on track.】

item.title: TPG 即将收购亚洲花卉企业 Hasfarm 的控股权
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，TPG 公司正与包括 Lombard Investments 公司在内的持有者就收购亚洲花卉企业 Hasfarm Holdings Ltd. 的控股权进行深入谈判。【原文：TPG Inc. is in advanced talks to buy a controlling stake in Asian floricultural business Hasfarm Holdings Ltd. from holders including Lombard Investments Inc., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 香港邀请大亨和银行签约大型土地项目
item.description: 在一位中国高级官员呼吁社会各界做出贡献并展现爱国主义精神之后，香港的房地产开发商和银行承诺支持该市一个价值十亿美元的大型项目。【原文：Hong Kong’s property developers and banks pledged to support a billion-dollar mega project in the city after a senior Chinese official urged the community to contribute and demonstrate patriotism.】
